speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Sarah from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing alright, thanks. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I understand. I'm calling regarding an account you have with City Bank. Can I please confirm your date of birth for security purposes?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for confirming. Can you also verify your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. You currently have an outstanding balance of $250. How would you like to proceed with the payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay $100 today and the rest next week.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds reasonable. Would you prefer to pay via debit card or bank transfer?

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I will guide you through the payment process now. Please have your card ready.

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect! Please provide your card number to begin.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you! I will process this payment for you right now.
